v2.description: Get all records using DataCite schema version 2.2 for the specified client.

v2.2_wo_res_type_gen.description: Get records using DataCite schema version 2.2 that don't have a general resource type specified.

v2.2_wt_contrib_funder.description: Get records using DataCite schema version 2.2 that have a funder listed as a contributor.
